[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@imhonglu/format](./format.md) &gt; [IdnHostname](./format.idnhostname.md)

## IdnHostname class

The IdnHostname formatter based on RFC 1034 and RFC 5890.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class IdnHostname 
```

## Example


```ts
IdnHostname.parse("한국.com");
// {
//   unicode: { labels: ["한국", "com"], tld: ".com" },
//   ascii: { labels: ["xn--3e0b707e", "com"], tld: ".com" }
// }
```
